text: "Come with us", his friends tell him. The night is splendid, the streets are quiet. We have movie tickets and even booked a table at a restaurant. Oh, no, you're not! Luder is protesting. I only go out when there's a degree, even a minimum, of uncertainty. Finished by Luder, 1989
title: Dichos de Luder 4
author: Julio Ramón Ribeyro
